item.description:
The Non-Profit Toolbox and Nonprofit Connector Group: Greater Boston are joining together to present an evening of education and networking.

Preregistered $10 - at the door: $15

A special evening for directors, board members and staff of non-profits to meet, find out what each are doing, have some FUN, and possibly go home with a donation to your cause!

The evening will include:

Appetizers and Drinks (cash bar available)
Choice of three short roundtable discussions with experts in the fields of employment, social media, fundraising, taxes, board development, HR etc.
A chance to “win” the 50/50 pool from proceeds from the event for your non-profit organization. (So the more attendees from your organization, the better the chance that you will win!)
Other Raffle prizes!!
Other raffle prizes are (more to be added):

The Advisory Board Kit from Susan Hammond
Book by Jane B Ford – Get Grants Now
Book: The Networked Nonprofit signed by authors Beth Kanter and Allison Fine
Something for your next fundraiser: Coupon for Balloon Ride for Two from Soaring Adventures (a $300+ value)


6 pm –8:15 pm

6-6:45 networking

6:45-7:05 1st Roundtable

7:10-7:30 2nd Roundtable

7:35-7:55 3rd Roundtable

8:00 wrap-up and drawings

RSVP here or to:


Sponsor:
item.name: Learning and Networking!
